item.title: HP Pavilion Dv6-1354US 15.6-Inch Laptop computer – An Sincere Assessment
item.description: Specs: I’ve all the time admired HP for producing a wide array of highly effective but inexpensive laptops. Of their effort to provide the very [...]
item.content:encoded:
Specs: I’ve all the time admired HP for producing a wide array of highly effective but inexpensive laptops. Of their effort to provide the very best laptops available in the market, they’re consistently producing new laptop computer fashions that include quite a lot of new and improved options. The brand new HP Pavilion DV6-1354US is at present one in every of HP’s newest 15.6-inch laptop computer fashions available in the market. It has a 2.2Ghz Core 2 Duo processor, 4GB of RAM and a bigger 500GB onerous drive. For show, this laptop computer has a 15.6-inch LED back-lit HD display screen (with a 1366 x 768 decision). Then there’s the set of Altec Lansing audio system that runs on SRS Premium sound expertise. Different specs embody 4 USB ports, a reminiscence card reader, HDMI output, Intel Wifi Hyperlink 100GBN, and rather more

Design: The HP Pavilion DV6-1354US sports activities a shiny jet-black casing that’s properly contrasted with hints of silver. For an edge, the laptop computer is embellished with some round motifs. This mannequin measure at about 14.9 x 10.15 x 1.5 inches and weighs 6.34 kilos, which is in regards to the measurement of a mean 15-inch laptop computer. General, this laptop computer sports activities HP’s signature skilled and modern look.

Options & Efficiency: Judging from its specs, the HP Pavilion DV6-1354US can be nicely suited to both work or play. It even comes with a tiny (but complete) distant management to allow you to entry quite a lot of multimedia controls from a distance. For graphics rendering, this mannequin makes use of the Intel Graphics Media Accelerator 4500MHD graphics card. The 6-cell batteries on this mannequin can last as long as 4 hours on one cost, which is kind of good for a laptop computer of this measurement (and specs). All in all, the HP Pavilion DV6-1354US 15.6-inch laptop computer is designed for anybody who’s on the lookout for purposeful and inexpensive full-featured laptop computer. Presently, this laptop computer is promoting for round $699 per unit, which is a good worth for this very competent laptop computer.
